Title: Prohibits sex offenders from operating automobiles participating in mobile application based transportation networks or being employed by such transportation networks
Summary: Prohibits sex offenders from operating automobiles participating in mobile application based transportation networks or being employed by such transportation networks.
LawCode: Amd ยง181, Gen Muni L; amd ยง401, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting sex offenders from operating automobiles participating in mobile application based transportation networks or being employed by such transportation networks
